name: Give me the weapons I need!
name_original: Give me the weapons I need!
description:
Reload the page if the controls don't work :c

Upgrade you weapon with different modules to survive against the waves of enemies
Use headphones for the best experience! There are many sounds in this game
Controls
Select up to three modules then press start. You will start off with only one but you will gain more modules the higher wave you go.

↑ and W to go forward
↓ and S to go backward
← / → or A/D to turn left and right

Your ship will fire automatically

The weapons

  1. Blaster - Shoots one bullet forward
  2. Dual shot - Shoots two smaller bullets at an angle
  3. Shockwave  - Launches an arc that goes through bullets and enemies
  4. Rapidfire - Shoots inaccurate bullets at a fast rate
  5. Energy orbs - Four orbs will orbit your ship, blocking small bullets and instantly killing enemies
  6. Mega bullet - Fires a huge bullet that destroys big bullets and kills enemies in its path
  7. Shotgun - Fires a cluster of small, short range bullets
  8. Broken laser - Shoots quick laser bullets behind you

Made by three people for Trijam #164

Programming was done by C. Haine in Scratch v3.
Artwork was drawn by K. Haine using Piskel
Music was composed by P. Haine using Logic Pro. Sound effects were edited in Audacity. Some sounds came from freesound.org
